data.answer: Thermally induced deformation of the ZnN4 tetrahedra

data.question: Does the inclusion of halogenated ligands within MOFs improve their gas-uptake properties?

data.answer: Synchrotron X-ray total scattering and pair distribution function analysis

data.answer: It suggests the resistance to recrystallization of the supercooled liquid state
